Articles.Content:
For all the chatter that wont fit existing threads and wouldn't work well in a thread of its own. Things like your rant about breakfast food or a comment on your cat. things that just don't quite fit anywhere, even in the off topic forum here.

Welp here it goes.

*Fires a revolver into the air*
What are you doing firing a gun in here?! Get out! In all seriousness, chat threads were banished because they became impossible to moderate and added little value to the community. Thread closed
